content: With the Gold Spikeplate equipped your defense is considerably increased. Additionally, when taking hits, you deal damage to enemies surrounding enemies.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gold_Spikeplate.md', within the main section titled 'Gold Spikeplate'.
The content is as follows:
With the Gold Spikeplate equipped your defense is considerably increased. Additionally, when taking hits, you deal damage to enemies surrounding enemies.
